definition: breath/news/interest (on an investment or loan)/to cease/to stop/to rest/Taiwan pr. [xi2]

sentences.english: Such lost worlds are vanishingly rare.
sentences.chinese: 這樣消逝的世界正在悄無聲息地變得稀有起來。

sentences.english: The pattering of my feet made no noise on the moist earth.
sentences.chinese: 潮溼的泥土使我的腳步聽起來悄無聲息。

sentences.english: And when we play, time goes by unnoticeably.
sentences.chinese: 當我們玩的時候，時間悄無聲息的走過。

sentences.english: The very stealth, the eerie quietness, of the thing makes it more magical.
sentences.chinese: 它的詭祕和悄無聲息更增添了它的神奇。

sentences.english: The night waned , and I worked hastily, but in silence.
sentences.chinese: 夜色闌珊，我麻利地忙活着，當然是悄無聲息。

sentences.english: All this appears crucial to the stealthy effect of Ryokan's works.
sentences.chinese: 這些對容坎作品中那種悄無聲息的效果都至關重要。

sentences.english: This operation failed silently, with no error message.
sentences.chinese: 這個操作悄無聲息地失敗了，沒有給出任何錯誤消息。

sentences.english: The ranger's footsteps made no sound as he climbed toward the summit.
sentences.chinese: 遊俠悄無聲息的向頂峯攀爬着。

sentences.english: The sea crept noiselessly up the shore.
sentences.chinese: 海水悄無聲息地上海岸。

sentences.english: Right here, the river of life floods, endlessly and silently.
sentences.chinese: 生命之河就在此地泛流，無止無盡，悄無聲息。

sentences.english: There is a silent health crisis among males nowadays.
sentences.chinese: 當今，在男性當中流行着一種悄無聲息的健康危機。

sentences.english: The ancient sanctuary at Olympus is being, so stealthyly, eroded by the darkness.
sentences.chinese: 奧林匹斯的上古神殿，被黑暗悄無聲息的侵蝕著。

sentences.english: Not only are toddler drownings quick, they're also typically silent.
sentences.chinese: 幼童的溺水過程不單快，而且悄無聲息。

sentences.english: According to a recent issue of PA Today, there is a silent health crisis among males in the United States.
sentences.chinese: 當今，在男性當中流行着一種悄無聲息的健康危機。

sentences.english: He suddenly and silently has no voice interest's appearing is jailing Pu many western rooms.
sentences.chinese: 他突然悄無聲息出現在關押普西多的房間。

sentences.english: He quietly heeled over the passage into the kitchen.
sentences.chinese: 他用腳後跟着地悄無聲息地走過走廊進了廚房。

definition: wordless and uncommunicative (idiom); without speaking/taciturn/not providing any news
lit. hiding the sky and covering the earth (idiom); fig. earth-shattering/omnipresent/of universal importance
to vanish like smoke in thin air/to disappear
